<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script will populate E-signature document column for all open HR Task of HR Task Type as 'Credential' and 'E-Signature'.</description>
        <name>Populate E-signature document</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var managedDocumentAttachmentMap = {};
var hrTasks = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_core_task");
hrTasks.addQuery('hr_task_type','IN', 'credential,e_signature');
hrTasks.addQuery('active','true');
hrTasks.query();
var hrUtils = new sn_hr_core.hr_Utils();
var acknowledgeDocument;
while(hrTasks.next()) {
	acknowledgeDocument = hrTasks.hr_task_document;
	if(!managedDocumentAttachmentMap[acknowledgeDocument]) {
		var managedDocumentDetails = hrUtils.getAcknowledgeDocument(acknowledgeDocument);
		if(managedDocumentDetails.status == "error")
			continue;

		managedDocumentAttachmentMap[acknowledgeDocument] = managedDocumentDetails.document;
	}
	
	hrTasks.sn_esign_document = managedDocumentAttachmentMap[acknowledgeDocument];
	hrTasks.update();
	
	new sn_docviewer.DocumentConversionOnDemand().convertToPDFAsync(managedDocumentAttachmentMap[acknowledgeDocument]);
}]]></script>
